short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly find your selected fragrance on your favorite website. Click the extension icon to change your preferred sites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
QuickSniff, making your life just a bit easier. Watching a YouTube video? Reading a blog? Stop copy / pasting and manually navigating. Quickly and easily find a selected fragrance on your favourite website. Just select the fragrance name, right click and click ‘Find on’ your favourite website in the selection menu.

Change your preferred sites by clicking the extension icon in your browser and click save!
